document_data.name: Xara Tantlor
document_data.mainbody: '''Xara Tantlor''' was a wizard and shopkeeper of the [[Shining Scroll]] in [[Silverymoon]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Xara worked as a wizard-for-hire but also managed a potion shop. All this was to fund her explorations of ruins and tombs in [[interior Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Relationship: Xara lived with a [[faerie dragon]] companion named [[Villynk]], who considered herself the true owner of the shop.
document_data.Possessions: Xara wore a [[mithral shirt]] that allowed her to move silently.
